name: Allies
description:
It is a multiplayer game.

Our game website: https://allies.211workshop.com/

Game Overview

Players will be divided into two groups - Reds and Blues.

Players in the same group cooperate and beat the enemies.

When the Reds have more members than the Blues,

One of the Reds is a traitor.

The traitor must betray and defeat all other players to win.

Join our Discord group to contact us

https://discord.gg/j5Rre3mn
